answers.text:
Hi Stephanie,
We in the City of Philadelphia are in the process of coming up with a taxonomy for our knowledge management system, including records management.  We are creating it in-house and are looking at Alfresco for our Doc management/records management piece.
I'd be happy to discuss further (contact info is on my profile) if I can know a bit more of what you're trying to develop exactly.  Is this a broad taxonomy or specifically around types of records?
Kind Regards,
Mike

author: Stephanie Klinkenberger
text:
The City of Virginia Beach is researching the creation of a records management taxonomy for future use in an electronic record keeping (ERM/ECRM) application.  If you have created a taxonomy for your city/county, can you please assist us by answering the questions below?

When was your taxonomy created/completed?  Has it been implemented?
Was the document created by in-house staff, or with the help of a consultant?
Do you currently use an ERM/ECRM system?  If yes, can you share with us which application?
Can you share a copy of your taxonomy?
Can you please provide contact information for your project?  Name, Department/Division, Telephone, Email?
title: Records Management Taxonomy
